content.raw:
Not related with this PR but have you noticed that code blocks created with

    ```{.sh}
    ```

include automatically the line number? This look a bit weird when is used to show a list of commands to be executed in a terminal. The workaround is to use `{.cpp}` for example. Nothing to do in this pull request, just a comment.
content.html:
Not related with this PR but have you noticed that code blocks created with

```{.sh}
```

include automatically the line number? This look a bit weird when is used to show a list of commands to be executed in a terminal. The workaround is to use {.cpp} for example. Nothing to do in this pull request, just a comment.
